description.p: Get the currently connected user id (according to the SQL database server).
Returns the currently connected database user id.

discussion.p: The CurrentUser function gets the currently connected user id for the SQL database server. This is the user id of the SQL database, not the Alpha Anywhere security framework.

example.caption: AddHoursToDateTime() function executed on the Northwind MySQL database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentUser() AS Expr1 FROM Customers =root
